text: To find out which dog breed is based in Switzerland, I will look into the origins of both Appenzeller Sennenhund and Drentse Patrijshond.
According to my knowledge about dog breeds, Appenzeller Sennenhund hails from the Swiss Alps.
On the other hand, Drentse Patrijshond is a Dutch breed, not typically associated with Switzerland.
Therefore, the Appenzeller Sennenhund is the dog breed based in Switzerland.
